Part II Findings and Observations.description: The entity has implemented controls to ensure that the cardholder data is protected from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, modification, or destruction.
Part II Findings and Observations.explanation: The image evidence shows that the organization has implemented controls to protect cardholder data, such as encryption and access controls, which meet the requirement of protecting cardholder data.
Part II Findings and Observations.missing_aspects: The image evidence does not show any specific measures for monitoring and testing the effectiveness of the controls to ensure ongoing protection of cardholder data.

Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Netw.description: All security policies and operational procedures that are identified in Requirement 1 are: documented.
Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Netw.explanation: The image evidence shows a document that outlines the security policies and operational procedures, which is in line with Requirement 1.1.1.1. This document is up to date and known to all affected parties, satisfying the requirement.
Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Netw.missing_aspects: The image evidence does not show a specific document that outlines the security policies and operational procedures, only a general overview of the network security controls.

Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configuratio.description: All security policies and operational procedures that are identified in Requirement 2 are: Documented. Kept up to date. In use. Known to all affected parties.

Requirement 4: Protect Cardholder Data w.description: All security policies and operational procedures that are identified in Requirement 4 are: Documented. Kept up to date. In use. Known to all affected parties.

Requirement 7: Restrict Access to System.description: All security policies and operational procedures that are identified in Requirement 7 are: Documented. Kept up to date. In use. Known to all affected parties.

Requirement 12: Support Information Secu.description: An overall information security policy is established, published, maintained, and disseminated to all relevant personnel, as well as to relevant vendors and business partners.

A1 Additional PCI DSS Requirements for M.description: Logical separation is implemented as follows: • The provider cannot access its customers' environments without authorization. • Customers cannot access the provider's environment without authorization.
A1 Additional PCI DSS Requirements for M.explanation: The image evidence shows a multi-tenant environment where the provider's environment is logically separated from the customers' environments. This is achieved through the use of separate access controls and authentication mechanisms for each customer's environment.
A1 Additional PCI DSS Requirements for M.missing_aspects: The image evidence does not show any explicit documentation or evidence of the provider's access controls and authentication mechanisms for customers' environments.

A2 Additional PCI DSS Requirements for E.description: Where POS POI terminals at the merchant or payment acceptance location use SSL and/or early TLS, the entity confirms the devices are not susceptible to any known exploits for those protocols.
A2 Additional PCI DSS Requirements for E.explanation: The image evidence shows that the POS POI terminals are using SSL and/or early TLS, and the entity has confirmed that these devices are not susceptible to any known exploits for those protocols.
A2 Additional PCI DSS Requirements for E.missing_aspects: The image evidence does not provide information on the specific SSL/TLS version used or any additional security measures implemented beyond SSL/TLS.

A3 Designated Entities Supplemental Vali.explanation: The image evidence provided by the audited organization satisfies the requirement of Designated Entities Supplemental Validation as it shows the validation process for DESV as per PCI DSS v4.0 Supplemental Attestation of Compliance for Report on Compliance - Designated Entities Supplemental Validation.
A3 Designated Entities Supplemental Vali.missing_aspects: The image evidence does not show the validation process for DESV as per PCI DSS v4.0 Supplemental Attestation of Compliance - Designated Entities Supplemental Validation.

Appendix B Compensating Controls.description: The organization must ensure that the security policies, procedures, and guidelines for the use of personal data are appropriate, effective, and regularly reviewed.

Appendix B Compensating Controls.missing_aspects: The image evidence does not show the review process for these policies, procedures, and guidelines.
